interestingcomments.content: The search is thankfully much faster now. I hope it will be as fast when the indexing is finished. All results are not showing up but I suppose that is a result of the ongoing indexing too. One very annoying thing is that criteria pop-up closes each time a selection is made.

interestingcomments.content: I'm wondering if the disparity could be a result of different habits of individual technicians, or perhaps slight differences in how rigorously each technician applies the reparation protocol set by Leica, i.e. if there is such a thing. It could be that I suppose. Not a good thing to do though, for people buying secondhand!
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: I'm wondering if the disparity could be a result of different habits of individual technicians, or perhaps slight differences in how rigorously each technician applies the reparation protocol set by Leica, i.e. if there is such a thing. interestingcomments.content: I did a terrible thing - I put my digital Leicas (two M9s) and auto Leicas (two M7S) into a remote storage locker. The feeling doing so was a gut-thing, it hurt. Looking on what is left are a couple dozen or so MF and LF cameras, half of which I built myself. Next is to pare them and put the remains to storage. Gut-wrenching as was when I gave away my library when I moved from a huge house to a one-bedroom cottage. Liberating is not easy. I do not really expect any benefit other than less distraction. Aside: I wonder what it will be like when my sh*t-load of photo gear, most of it obsolete, is disposed of in an estate sale. Who would care, pay, or even know what's there? I have dreams of scenarios, none pleasant. Time for the daily nap. --img--  Edited June 4, 2018 by pico

interestingcomments.content: I hadn't heard anything of the Trump/Harley thing until this. Interesting............ (Ok, Jaap, this is only an explanation. It's not a political discussion.) Harley Davidson announced recently that they would start building some of their motorcycles in Europe. This annoyed Mr Trump, so he suggested a boycott.
